summary:
Welcome to Highstreet World - Highstreet blends retail with gaming, paving the way for meta-lifestyles and new experiences in a multifaceted metaverse.

 Marketplace - Discover in-game items to elevate your Highstreet experience, along with exclusive phygital products for your digital and real life.

 Highstreet Homes - Own and personalize your metaverse experience with virtual real estate.

 HIGH - HIGH token is the in-game currency of Highstreet World ecosystem. Get HIGH on exchanges to purchase assets.

 Join our Community - Highstreet is a place for friendship, adventure, and fun. Meet explorers from all over the world and play together!
